com.superduckinvaders.game.entity

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Entity
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.PhysicsEntity
        • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mob, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends PhysicsEntity
    Represents a character in the game.

      • Character

        public Character(Round parent,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 int maximumHealth)
        Initialises this Character.
        Parameters:
        parent - the round this Character belongs to
        x - the initial x coordinate
        y - the initial y coordinate
        maximumHealth - the maximum (and initial) health of this Character
